answerText: Thornton Wilder[10] This is the name of the horse-owning local milkman in Our Town.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 11 | 20 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Horace Vandergelder is the title character of this author's play The Merchant of Yonkers. For 10 points each: [10] Name this playwright, who wrote about Emily Webb's brief return to life in Grover's Corners in Our Town.
